TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiscoveryClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol

summary.span: 为以编程方式调用 XML Web services 发现提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for programmatically invoking XML Web services discovery.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web 服务发现是查找时，或发现、 一个进程或多个相关文档，描述了可用的 XML Web 服务。XML Web service discovery is the process of locating, or discovering, one or more related documents that describe available XML Web services. 它是通过 XML Web services 发现 XML Web 服务客户端了解在给定的 URL 以及如何使用它们的可用 XML Web 服务。It is through XML Web services discovery that XML Web service clients learn about the available XML Web services at a given URL and how to use them. XML Web services 发现从你已获取的 URL 发现文档中，可能是通过使用目录服务，例如内部部署的工作原理http://uddi.microsoft.com，但是，您没有提供的 XML Web 服务有关的详细信息。XML Web services discovery works from the premise that you have already obtained the URL to a discovery document, possibly through a directory service, such as http://uddi.microsoft.com, however, you do not have the details about the XML Web services offered. 可以通过 XML Web 服务发现，发现的详细信息中列出的 XML Web 服务在特定的 URL。Through XML Web services discovery, you can discover the details about the XML Web services listed in a at a specific URL. XML Web 服务客户端通过提供的 URL 来启动 XML Web services 发现或方法。An XML Web service client starts XML Web services discovery by supplying a URL to either the or methods. 通常情况下，此 URL 是指发现文档中，它反过来引用文档，用于描述一个或多个 XML Web services，将添加到属性。Typically, this URL refers to a discovery document, which in turn refers to documents that describe one or more XML Web services, which are added to the property. 此时，该文档仅下载和验证以指向有效的 XML Web 服务信息。At that point, only that document is downloaded and verified to point to valid information about XML Web services. 但是，在此阶段未验证该文档中包含的引用。However, the references contained in that document are not verified at this stage. 而是添加到属性。Instead they are added to the property. 若要验证引用是否有效，请调用或方法，将其添加到有效的引用的文档属性。To verify that the references are valid, invoke the or methods, which add valid referenced documents to the property. 最后，如果客户端想要保存到磁盘中，调用的发现结果方法。Last, if a client wants to save the discovery results to disk, invoke the method. 如果不需要以编程方式访问 XML Web services 发现，[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]用于发现命令提示符中的 XML Web 服务提供 Web 服务发现工具 (Disco.exe)。If programmatic access to XML Web services discovery is not needed, the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] ships the Web Services Discovery tool (Disco.exe) for discovering XML Web services within a command prompt. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务发现工具 (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979)。For more details, see [Web Services Discovery Tool (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是演示如何使用 Web 窗体类中的其他类以及命名空间以编程方式调用 XML Web services 发现。The following code example is a Web Form demonstrating how to use the class together with the other classes in the namespace to programmatically invoke XML Web services discovery. 代码示例演示如何使用， ， ， ， ，和方法。The code example demonstrates using the , , , , , and methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取除在发现文档中找到的引用以外的信息。

span.span: Gets information in addition to references found in the discovery document.

value.span: ，它包含在发现文档中找到的附加信息。

span.span: An containing additional information found in the discovery document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性主要包含 SOAP 绑定，由表示发现文档中定义的类。The property primarily contains SOAP bindings, represented by the class, defined in the discovery document. ## Examples [!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/CPP/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/CS/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/VB/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument Discover(string url) cil managed
Public Function Discover (url As String) As DiscoveryDocument

param.name: url
param.span: XML Web services 发现开始位置的 URL。

span.span: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.

summary.span: 发现提供的 URL 以确定它是否为发现文档。

span.span: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document.

returns.span: ，它包含所提供 URL 处的 XML Web services 发现的结果。

span.span: A containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法需要提供的 URL 是发现文档。The method expects that the supplied URL is a discovery document. 如果 URL 所引用的服务说明或 XML 架构是引发异常。If the URL refers to a service description or an XML schema an exception is thrown. 若要发现的 XML 架构或服务说明调用方法。To discover an XML schema or a service description invoke the method. 如果所提供的 URL 指向有效的发现文档，所提供的 URL 处的发现文档添加到和集合。If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the and collection. 此外，将发现文档中的引用添加到集合，但不是进行验证以指向有效的发现文档。Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents. 若要验证的引用，请指向有效的发现文档，以调用或方法。To verify the references, point to valid discovery documents to invoke the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个填充 Web 窗体包含的详细信息中的文档XML Web services 发现过程，每个文档中找到与所引用的属性。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填充的结果与调用后跟调用。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 访问所提供的 URL 返回了一个 HTTP 状态代码而不是 。

span.span: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than .

exception.span: 参数是有效的 URL，但未指向有效的发现文档。

span.span: The parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument DiscoverAny(string url) cil managed
Public Function DiscoverAny (url As String) As DiscoveryDocument

param.name: url
param.span: XML Web services 发现开始位置的 URL。

span.span: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.

summary.span: 发现提供的 URL 以确定它是否是发现文档、服务说明或 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document, service description or an XML Schema Definition (XSD) schema.

returns.span: ，它包含所提供 URL 处的 XML Web services 发现的结果。

span.span: A containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.

returns.span: 如果 参数引用服务说明或 XSD 架构，则在内存中为它创建 。

span.span: If the parameter refers to a service description or an XSD Schema, a is created in memory for it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将发现提供的 URL 是发现文档、 服务说明或 XSD 架构。The method discovers whether the supplied URL is a discovery document, service description or XSD schema. 如果它已知的 URL 仅指发现文档中，可能调用方法。If it is known that the URL only refers to a discovery document, the method might be invoked. 如果所提供的 URL 指向有效的发现文档、 XSD 架构或服务说明中，所提供的 URL 处的发现文档添加到和集合。If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, XSD schema, or service description, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the and collections. 当所提供的 URL 引用的 XSD 架构或服务说明是在内存中创建并添加到和集合。When the supplied URL refers to an XSD schema or Service Description a is created in memory and added to the and collections. 此外，将发现文档中的引用添加到集合，但不是进行验证以指向有效的发现文档。Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents. 若要验证引用是否指向有效的发现文档，请调用或方法。To verify that references point to valid discovery documents, invoke the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个填充 Web 窗体包含的详细信息中的文档XML Web services 发现过程，每个文档中找到与所引用的属性。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填充的结果与调用后跟调用。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than .

exception.span: 参数是有效的 URL，但不指向有效的发现文档、服务说明或 XSD 架构。

span.span: The parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document, service description, or XSD schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用期间填充集合， ，和方法。The collection is populated during invocations to the , , and methods. 在调用期间并方法，如果提供的 URL 是一个有效的发现文档，该文档添加到集合。During invocations to the and methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the collection. 在调用期间并中的方法，有效的发现文档引用集合添加到集合。During invocations to the and methods, valid discovery document references in the collection are added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个填充 Web 窗体包含的详细信息中的文档XML Web services 发现过程中发现的属性。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property discovered during XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填充的结果与调用后跟调用。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection ReadAll(string topLevelFilename) cil managed
Public Function ReadAll (topLevelFilename As String) As DiscoveryClientResultCollection

param.name: topLevelFilename
param.span: 要读入的文件的名称，该文件包含已保存发现文档的映射。

span.span: Name of file to read in, containing the map of saved discovery documents.

summary.span: 读入包含已保存的发现文档的映射的文件，并使用该文件中引用的发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构和服务说明填充 和 属性。

span.span: Reads in a file containing a map of saved discovery documents populating the and properties, with discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions referenced in the file.

returns.span: ，它包含在具有已保存发现文档的映射的文件中找到的结果。

span.span: A containing the results found in the file with the map of saved discovery documents.

returns.span: 文件格式是已序列化为 XML 的 类；然而，通常只使用 方法或 Disco.exe 创建该文件。

span.span: The file format is a class serialized into XML; however, one would typically create the file using only the method or Disco.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过创建包含已保存的发现文档的映射文件方法或 Disco.exe。A file containing a map of saved discovery documents can be created by the method or Disco.exe. `topLevelFilename`参数必须包含完全限定的路径，如果该文件不存在当前目录中。The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个填充 Web 窗体有关的文档和中现有的发现映射文档使用找到的引用的详细信息与方法。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents and references found in an existing discovery map document using the method. [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property References As DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection

summary.span: 在已解析的发现文档中找到的引用的集合。

span.span: A collection of references founds in resolved discovery documents.
A of references discovered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用期间填充集合， ，和方法。The collection is populated during invocations to the , , and methods. 在调用期间并方法，如果提供的 URL 是一个有效的发现文档，该文档添加到发现文档中找到与引用的集合。During invocations to the and methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the collection together with references found in the discovery document. 在调用过程中添加的引用和方法不一定是有效的发现文档。References added during invocations to the and methods are not necessarily valid discovery documents. 在调用期间并内引用集合验证为有效的发现文档。During invocations to and references within the collection are verified as being valid discovery documents. 如果凭据有效，并且包含的引用，它们也添加到集合。If they are valid and contain references, they are also added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个填充 Web 窗体包含的详细信息中的引用XML Web services 发现过程中发现的属性。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the references in the property discovered during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填充到调用中找到了引用。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the references found in an invocation to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.References#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.References/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.References#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.References/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAll() cil managed

summary.span: 解析所有对 属性中的发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构和服务说明的引用以及在引用的发现文档中找到的引用。

span.span: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions in the property, as well as references found in referenced discovery documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 解析所有有效引用它查找，并将它们放入属性。 resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the property. 这两并下载并验证 XSD 架构和服务中的说明属性。Both and download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the property. 但是，两个方法的处理发现文档的方式有所不同。However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents. 解析中的发现文档中的所有引用属性; 如果发现文档包含对其他发现文档的引用都解析只是那些发现文档。 resolves all references in discovery documents within the property; if a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, resolves just those discovery documents. 在那些发现文档中找到的发现文档位于下一个层级深度没有解析的嵌套; 而解析它们。Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ; whereas resolves them all. 继续解决中嵌套的发现文档的引用，直到没有更多的引用。 continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references. 通过在验证过程中发生的错误都不匹配项，时会引发但而不是收集并添加到属性。Errors occurring during the verification process done by are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个填充 Web 窗体包含的详细信息中的文档XML Web services 发现过程，每个文档中找到与所引用的属性。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填充的结果与调用后跟调用。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveOneLevel() cil managed

summary.span: 解析 中所有对发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构以及服务说明的引用以及在那些发现文档中找到的引用。

span.span: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions in , as well as references found in those discovery documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 解析所有有效引用它查找，并将它们放入属性。 resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the property. 这两并下载并验证 XSD 架构和服务中的说明属性。Both and download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the property. 但是，两个方法的处理发现文档的方式有所不同。However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents. 解析中的发现文档中的所有引用属性。 resolves all references in discovery documents within the property. 如果发现文档中包含对其他发现文档的引用解析只是那些发现文档。If a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, resolves just those discovery documents. 在那些发现文档中找到的发现文档位于下一个层级深度没有解析的嵌套; 而解决所有这些问题。Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ; whereas resolve them all. 继续解决中嵌套的发现文档的引用，直到没有更多的引用。 continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references. 通过在验证过程中发生的错误都不匹配项，时会引发但而不是收集并添加到属性。Errors occurring during the verification process done by are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个填充 Web 窗体包含的详细信息中的文档XML Web services 发现过程，每个文档中找到与所引用的属性。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填充的结果与调用后跟调用。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection WriteAll(string directory, string topLevelFilename) cil managed
Public Function WriteAll (directory As String, topLevelFilename As String) As DiscoveryClientResultCollection

param.name: directory
param.span: 要将 属性中的当前所有文档保存到其中的目录。

span.span: The directory in which to save all documents currently in the property.

param.name: topLevelFilename
param.span: 要创建或覆盖的文件的名称，该文件包含所有已保存的文档的映射。

span.span: The name of the file to create or overwrite containing a map of all documents saved.

summary.span: 将 属性中的所有发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构和服务说明写入提供的目录并在此目录中创建一个文件。

span.span: Writes all discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and Service Descriptions in the property to the supplied directory and creates a file in that directory.

returns.span: 包含所有已保存文件的结果的 。

span.span: A containing the results of all files saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建了名为的文件`topLevelFilename`directory 参数所指定的目录中的参数包含已保存的发现文档、 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构和服务说明的映射。The file created with the name of the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the directory specified by the directory parameter contains a map of saved discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions. 可以读取此文件中使用方法来填充和属性。This file can be read in using the method to populate the and properties. 文件的格式为 XML 包含序列化的版本的类。The format of the file is XML containing an serialized version of the class. 如果存在具有相同的名称的文件`topLevelFilename`中的参数`directory`参数，该文件会被覆盖方法。If a file exists with the same name as the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the `directory` parameter, that file is overwritten by the method. `topLevelFilename`参数必须包含完全限定的路径，如果该文件不存在当前目录中。The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是将 Web 服务发现的结果写入到磁盘中，通过调用一个 Web 窗体方法之后调用和。The following code example is a Web Form that writes the results of a Web Services discovery to disk by invoking the method after calls to and . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]
